settings.html_area:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    let foundH2 = false;

    function checkForH2() {
      if (foundH2) return;
      
      const h2Element = document.querySelector("#insta-feed h2");
      
      if (h2Element) {
        foundH2 = true;
        h2Element.style.cursor = "pointer";
                
        h2Element.onclick = function () {
          window.location.href = "https://instagram.com/berobrewing";
        };

        window.removeEventListener("scroll", checkForH2);
        window.removeEventListener("resize", checkForH2);
      }
    }

    window.addEventListener("scroll", checkForH2);
    window.addEventListener("resize", checkForH2);

    checkForH2();
  });
</script>
